thread.title: Great place to stay when visitingredients London -
thread.title_full: Great place to stay when visitingredients London - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Chris D
title: Great place to stay when visitingredients London -
text: Good place to stay as a solo traveller very close to Euston station and the tubenvironment and an easy walk to St Pancras and Kings Cross. Quick check in. Comfortable lounge bar for a late night drink. The room was clean with a comfortable bed.
